summary: This document is an email communication from Amanda Kirby to Lesley regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to discuss account management with the Deutsche Bank team. It highlights the scheduling of a meeting during the week of October 8 when Epstein is expected to return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to coordinate a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the recipient of the email and is being asked to check Epstein's availability for the meeting.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for her client, Jeffrey Epstein, with the Deutsche Bank team.
Jeffrey Epstein is seeking to meet with Paul, who is part of the team managing his accounts.
Amanda is reaching out to Lesley to confirm Epstein's availability for the meeting.
Harry provided information to Amanda about Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to discuss account management.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is scheduled for the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to New York City.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for the meeting.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team that will manage Epstein's accounts.
